I like netorare because of the extreme realism presented. Vanilla is just wishful thinking, done by naive children. NTR is (most of the time) similar to life, in the sense that it will stick its gigantic massive cock so hard up your ass that it will come out of your mouth. And when life's done fucking you over, you will end up talking to yourself like a fucking crazy person just so you can cope with the pain and try to live a normal life like the rest of the people, because you know you can't talk to anyone else about it. Why? Nobody fucking cares about your problems, unless you pay them to. You will then realize how alone you actually are and the fact that people don't care about honor, friendship, fairness, or any of that crap. Netorare shows how humans actually are behind their social facade. Self-indulgent, selfish, vice-worshiping scum. But at the end of the day, it's not all that bad. Why? Because humanity has done 1 thing right in its entire existence. What exactly? Technology!
